wordsFound(char[][]) - Static method in class CrosswordPanel
Checks both horizontal and vertical inputs to check if user inputted answers are correct
wordsFoundHorizontal(char[][]) - Method in class CrosswordPanel
Checks if the horizontally inputted words are correct Returns a new list of all the correct words from the crossword the user played
wordsFoundVertical(char[][]) - Method in class CrosswordPanel
Checks if the vertically inputted words are correct Returns a new list of all the correct words from the crossword the user played
